data.name: Macquarie Property Versatile
data.description: Residentially secured loan for more complex borrowing structures.

features.additionalInfo: Flexible repayment structures. Interest Only, Principal & Interest and Principal + Interest* repayment types available. Maximum Interest Only loan term of 5 years, subject to credit approval. * Repayments made up of a set principal repayment amount plus interest accrued eg. Monthly repayment of $2,000 off the principal plus interest accrued for that month.
Equity release. Equity release available for a range of borrowing purposes, subject to approval.

Sub-accounts available. Set up multiple sub accounts to draw down on the overarching facility limit. All sub-accounts are required to be on the same interest rate and repayment type. All sub-accounts must have the same regulated/non-regulated loan purpose as the overarching facility.
Relationship servicing. Dedicated relationship team who specialise in different industries and can provide tailored solutions and industry information.
Subject to review, a guarantor may be required during the loan origination process.
Extra repayments can be made in addition to regular monthly loan repayments.

constraints.additionalInfo: Maximum LVR of 80% dependent on location and value of security.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Borrowers must be Individual, Company, Partnership, Trust.
Security must be a residential property or cash.

Maximum LVR - Medical Professionals, General Practitioners, Day and Short Stay Hospitals, Diagnostic: Up to 3.5x EBITDA*, or 70% of external valuation. Up to 2 year interest only. Interest only ongoing up to 1.5x EBITDA*. Veterinary Clinic (Vet), Dental Services: Up to 3 x EBITDA*, or 70% of external valuation. Up to 2 year interest only. Interest only ongoing up to 1.5x EBITDA*. Up to 75% LVR for commercial owner-occupied property. Interest only terms also available.

Maximum LVR - Engineers, Architects, Planners, Surveyors, associated service providers in Built Environment: up to 3.0x EBITDA* subject to business turnover and number of guarantors. Legal: For 2 partners, up to 1x yearly stabilised earnings per partner (capped at $500k per partner). For 3 or more partners, up to 1x yearly stabilised earnings per partner (capped at $1m per partner).

Maximum LVR - Legal: For 2 partners, up to 1x yearly stabilised earnings per partner (capped at $500k per partner). For 3 or more partners, up to 1x yearly stabilised earnings per partner (capped at $1m per partner).
Maximum LVR - Accounting: The lower of: a. Up to 3.5x EBITDA* (additional debt to EBITDA limits apply above $1mil) b. Up to 70% of recurring fees c. Up to $2m debt per guarantor.

Maximum LVR - Financial Planning: a. For Self-licensed Firms the lower of up to 3.75x EBITDA* or 67% loan to value ratio***. b. For Corporate Authorised Representatives the lower of up to 3.3x EBITDA* or 60% loan to value ratio***. *** LVR based on 2.3 x recurring wealth income plus 2.5 x recurring risk income

Maximum LVR - Insurance Broking: a. For recurring revenue ≤$1m, up to 60% of asset value determined by internal Macquarie Multiplier and amortising b. For recurring revenue >$1m, up to 4x EBITDA* amortising c. Interest Only (IO) terms may be considered for recurring revenue >$1m, IO ongoing up to 3x EBITDA*.
Maximum LVR - Real Estate: Up to a maximum of 70% of rent roll value determined by internal Macquarie Multiplier (no cost to client) and must amortise to 60% within 3 years.

Maximum LVR - Strata: a. Where lots under management <5,000 and all WA based strata managers, up to a maximum of 70% of strata roll value b. Where lots under management ≥5,000 excluding all WA based strata managers, up to 4.5x EBITDA*. c. Business Valuations determined by internal Macquarie Multiplier (no cost to client) d. Ongoing Interest Only (IO) available at maximum LVR.

Maximum LVR - IT Services: Typically, revenue of >$3m. When revenue ≥$30m, maximum lending of 3x EBITDA*. When revenue <$30m, maximum lending of 2x EBITDA*. Interest Only (IO) is available for up to 2 years. Longer terms may be considered. Software (SAAS): Typically, revenue of >$3m. Maximum lending of 3x EBITDA*. Interest Only (IO) is available for up to 2 years. Longer terms may be considered.

*Minimum loan sizes apply and will vary depending on a variety of factors. Contact us if you’d like more information. This is a guide only. EBITDA can be adjusted for items such as principal salaries, exceptional items and other factors based on individual borrower circumstances.
**Note, this information is only a guide. Each loan will be subject to individual assessment in accordance with our credit and other internal policies. Additional parameters may apply.

fees.name: Establishment fee
fees.additionalInfo: Individual: $1,000. Corporate Borrowers: ≤$3m up to 0.50% of limit >$3m available (& negotiable) on application

fees.name: Valuation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if any valuation is required in respect to any security property.

fees.name: Other Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fees are current at time of publication of this guide and subject to change. Other additional fees and charges may apply. Please refer to loan documents.
